class.name: lwr_controllers/JointControllers
class.description: The JointImpedanceController tracks effort commands. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: lwr_controllers/KUKAJointStateController
class.description: The KUKAJointStateController is for publishing information such as ee_pos and joint pose on ros topics

class.name: lwr_controllers/JointKinematiscImp
class.description: The KUKAJointStateController is for publishing information such as ee_pos and joint pose on ros topics

class.name: lwr_controllers/JointPositionImpedanceController
class.description: The JointPositionImpedanceController tracks joint position commands. It expects a PositionJointInterface type of hardware interface.
